thread.title: Seattle Seahawks-San Francisco 49ers: Live updates, score and game chat
thread.title_full: Seattle Seahawks-San Francisco 49ers: Live updates, score and game chat | OregonLive.com

author: Tim Brown | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Seattle Seahawks-San Francisco 49ers: Live updates, score and game chat
text:
The Seattle Seahawks kick off Week 7 of the 2015 NFL season with a return home to face the San Francisco 49ers and quarterback Colin Kaepernick on Thursday Night Football. Kickoff is at 5:25 p.m. (TV on CBS, Comcast/Xfinity channel 6 or 706 for HD)
More : TV channel and how to watch this game online
Follow along as we bring you live updates and analysis from the game from kickoff through the final whistle in the comments section below. Have thoughts on how Pete Carroll and the Seahawks are performing against their bitter rivals? Don't hesitate to jump in on the live updates and chat with us as the game rolls along.
